htmlEmbed:
Find COVID-19 vaccine locations near you3/6/2022

Vaccines.gov helps you find clinics, pharmacies, and other locations that offer COVID-19 vaccines in the United States.

ArchivedRead

readabilityObject.title: Find COVID-19 vaccine locations near you
readabilityObject.content:
We want to make COVID-19 vaccination easy and accessible to everyone.

COVID-19 vaccines are free and available to anyone who wants one. We work with partners such as clinics, pharmacies and health departments to provide accurate and up-to-date information about vaccination services in your area.

This page is brought to you by the United States Department of Health and Human Services, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), and VaccineFinder from Boston Children’s Hospital.

We can do this.
readabilityObject.textContent: We want to make COVID-19 vaccination easy and accessible to everyone.COVID-19 vaccines are free and available to anyone who wants one. We work with partners such as clinics, pharmacies and health departments to provide accurate and up-to-date information about vaccination services in your area.This page is brought to you by the United States Department of Health and Human Services, the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC), and VaccineFinder from Boston Children’s Hospital.We can do this.
readabilityObject.excerpt: Vaccines.gov helps you find clinics, pharmacies, and other locations that offer COVID-19 vaccines in the United States.
